alert.note: Alert for Christian; Hopkins; Muhlenberg; Todd (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Muhlenberg, northeastern Christian, north central Todd and southeastern Hopkins Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 445 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Madisonville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Madisonville, Earlington, Nortonville, and Mortons Gap around 450 PM CDT. Graham around 455 PM CDT. Greenville around 505 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Powderly and Weir. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 102 and 120. Western Kentucky Parkway between Mile Markers 39 and 54. Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 31 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
